item.title: 飓风弗朗辛预计将使保险公司损失近 15 亿美元
item.description: 飓风弗朗辛于9月11日在路易斯安那州登陆，风力为2级，根据灾难建模公司Karen Clark & Company的早期估计，预计将给保险公司造成近15亿美元的损失。【原文：Hurricane Francine — which made landfall in Louisiana on Sept. 11 with Category 2 winds — is expected to cost insurers close to $1.5 billion, according to an early estimate from catastrophe modeling firm Karen Clark & Company.】

item.title: 德国银行敦促经济部把握证券化势头
item.description: 代表德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）和德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）的游说团体敦促德国政府抓住最近人们对重振证券化市场的兴趣，以此来促进整个地区的贷款。【原文：The lobby group representing Deutsche Bank AG and Commerzbank AG has urged the German government to seize on the recent interest in reviving the securitization market as a way to boost lending across the region.】

item.title: 氧化铝再次中断后铝价跳涨
item.description: 印度韦丹塔公司（Vedanta Ltd. ）氧化铝精炼厂的一个储水池坍塌，可能使本已紧张的市场失去更多这种重要原材料的供应，这一消息传出后，铝价上涨。【原文：Aluminum prices gained following news that that a water storage pond at a Vedanta Ltd. alumina refinery in India collapsed, potentially removing more supply of the crucial raw material in an already tight market.】

item.title: 微软与沃达丰签署 Office AI 协议，为 Excel 和 Outlook 增加功能
item.description:
Excel 将获得适用于 Python 语言的人工智能工具，Outlook 将获得电子邮件优先级功能。【原文：

Excel will get AI tools for Python language, Outlook gets email prioritization features.

】

item.title: 橡树山为 Worldpac 提供 7.75 亿美元私人贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Oak Hill Advisors 已提供 7.75 亿美元的私人信用贷款，帮助凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Oak Hill Advisors has provided a $775 million private credit loan to help Carlyle Group Inc. finance its acquisition of auto parts distributor Worldpac, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 银行私人信贷风险受到欧元区监管机构的新一轮审查
item.description: 知情人士告诉彭博新闻社，欧洲中央银行正在向顶级贷款机构施压，要求他们提供更多有关与私人信贷公司交易的细节，这是全球为使传统金融业免受潜在影子银行危机影响而做出的最新努力。【原文：The European Central Bank is pressing top lenders for more details on their dealings with private credit firms, people with knowledge of the matter told Bloomberg News, in the latest global effort to inoculate the traditional financial sector from a potential shadow banking crisis.】

item.title: 伊贝尔德罗拉公司寻求在西班牙合资公司中持有人工智能数据中心股份
item.description: Iberdrola SA 公司计划为一个西班牙数据中心提供电网连接和可再生能源，以换取该设施多达 20% 的股份，该设施的建设成本将高达 20 亿欧元。【原文：Iberdrola SA plans to provide a Spanish data center with a grid connection and renewable power in exchange for up to 20% of the facility, which will cost as much as €2 billion to build.】

item.title: 特鲁多放宽抵押贷款规定以争取年轻选民
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）总理的政府将向所有首次购房者和新建房屋的买家提供 30 年期抵押贷款，这位饱受争议的领导人正试图重新赢得年轻加拿大人的支持。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government will make 30-year mortgages available to all first-time buyers and to buyers of newly built homes as the embattled leader tries to win back the approval of younger Canadians.】

item.title: 世贸组织称奥孔约-伊韦拉将寻求连任总干事
item.description: 世界贸易组织总干事恩古齐-奥孔乔-伊韦拉（Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala）的发言人在一份电子邮件声明中说，她将寻求在这个总部设在日内瓦的贸易机构连任。【原文：World Trade Organization Director-General Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala will seek a second term at the Geneva-based trade body, a spokesman said in an emailed statement.】

item.title: 前 Glencore 交易员计划回归，但表示合规是个难题
item.description: 一位前嘉能可公司（Glencore Plc）铜交易员正计划重返该行业--但不是金属实物交易，他批评说，金属实物交易已经 "被合规、会计师和律师控制"。【原文：A former Glencore Plc copper trader is planning a return to the industry – but not to physical trading of metals, which he criticizes as having become “controlled by compliance, by accountants and by lawyers.”】

item.title: 花旗集团在气候抗议中继续关注化石燃料交易
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Citigroup Inc. stepped up its dealmaking in the underwriting of bonds for fossil-fuel companies, a development that coincided with intense climate protests outside its Manhattan office.】

item.title: 无聊是好事"，美国银行策略师青睐红利股票
item.description: 大选、经济、本周美国降息的幅度有多大，所有这些都让市场人心惶惶。美国银行（Bank of America Corp）股票和量化策略师萨维塔-苏布拉马尼安（Savita Subramanian）希望投资者规避风险。【原文：The election, the economy, just how big this week’s US interest rate cut will be — it has all left the market on edge. Savita Subramanian, an equity and quant strategist at Bank of America Corp., wants investors to avoid risks.】

item.title: 机构称阿达尼肯尼亚输电交易仍在谈判中
item.description: 肯尼亚电力传输公司（Kenya Electricity Transmission Co.【原文：The Kenya Electricity Transmission Co. said it’s still in talks with Adani Energy Solutions Ltd. for the construction of three power lines, contradicting a presidential adviser who announced that two companies including the Indian firm had already been awarded deals for as much as $1.3 billion.】

item.title: 分析师警告 iPhone 16 需求疲软，苹果股价暴跌
item.description: 苹果公司股价周一下跌，此前一位密切关注该公司的分析师警告称，该公司新款 iPhone 16 Pro 机型的需求低于预期。【原文：Apple Inc. shares fell Monday after a closely followed analyst warned that demand for the firm’s new iPhone 16 Pro model has been lower than expected.】

item.title: 波音公司将向巴西航空工业公司支付 1.5 亿美元以补偿被破坏的组合
item.description: 波音公司将为其与巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer SA）失败的合并支付 1.5 亿美元，迫使这家美国公司在努力支撑其资产负债表之际交出资金。【原文：Boeing Co. will pay Embraer SA $150 million for its failed combination with the Brazilian aircraft maker, forcing the US company to hand over funds at a time when it’s trying to prop up its balance sheet.】

item.title: 继电动汽车之后，中国 CATL 试图在电动卡车领域占据主导地位
item.description: 当代 Amperex 科技有限公司安培雷斯科技有限公司在短时间内成为全球最大的电动汽车电池制造商。现在，这家中国公司希望复制其在国内市场取得的成功，在全球卡车领域占据主导地位。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. has in a short space of time become the world’s largest maker of electric car batteries. Now the Chinese company wants to dominate in trucks globally, copying the success seen in its home market.】

item.title: 有报道称博士伦正在探讨出售事宜，公司业绩因此大涨
item.description: Bausch + Lomb 公司的股价创下历史最高涨幅，此前有报道称这家眼科护理公司正在考虑出售自己，以摆脱债务缠身的母公司。【原文：Bausch + Lomb Corp. shares rose the most ever following a report that the eye-care company is considering selling itself to disentangle from its debt-laden parent company.】

item.title: Pimco 首席执行官罗曼称投资者正纷纷涌入固定收益领域
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Investors are adding to their fixed income exposure as imminent interest rate cuts create opportunities, according to Emmanuel Roman, chief executive officer of Pacific Investment Management Co.】

item.title: 贝莱德对债券发出警告，称美联储降息押注过度
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. strategists turned underweight short-dated US Treasuries from overweight, saying the extent of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts the market is betting on is unlikely to pan out.】

item.title: 政变幸存者阿尔塞为摆脱玻利维亚金融危机绘制图表
item.description: 玻利维亚总统路易斯-阿尔塞（Luis Arce）发誓要优先考虑燃料进口和债务偿还问题，因为美元短缺已将这个安第斯国家推向混乱的边缘。【原文：Bolivian President Luis Arce vowed to prioritize fuel imports and debt payments as he navigates the dollar shortage that has taken the Andean nation to the brink of chaos.】

item.title: 随着支出的增加，深水钻井平台每天可卖 60 万美元
item.description: 全球最大的海上钻井平台承包商负责人表示，如果未来几年石油公司的需求继续增加，深水钻井平台的租赁价格可能会攀升至接近创纪录的水平。【原文：The price to rent a deepwater drilling rig may climb to near record levels if demand from oil companies continues to increase in the coming years, according to the head of the world’s biggest offshore rig contractor.】

item.title: 加拿大新石油管道将油流从美湾转向亚洲
item.description: 加拿大新扩建的太平洋输油管道为该国原油在亚洲打开了新的市场，同时减少了美国墨西哥湾沿岸的流量，至少部分实现了该项目使该行业客户群多样化的承诺。【原文：Canada’s newly expanded oil pipeline to the Pacific is opening new markets for the country’s crude in Asia while reducing flows off the US Gulf Coast, at least partly fulfilling the project’s promise of diversifying the industry’s customer base.】

item.title: 爱沙尼亚中央银行行长抨击国际货币基金组织与俄罗斯重新合作的计划
item.description: 爱沙尼亚央行行长与一些欧洲财长一道，批评国际货币基金组织自俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以来首次重启对其经济审查的计划。【原文：Estonia’s central bank chief joined a group of European finance ministers in criticizing the International Monetary Fund’s plan to restart reviews of Russia economy for the first time since its invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 津巴布韦通过加强矿山监控打击黄金走私
item.description: 津巴布韦矿业部长温斯顿-奇坦多 (Winston Chitando) 周一表示，津巴布韦计划通过加强对矿区的监控来解决猖獗的黄金走私问题。【原文：Zimbabwe plans to tackle rampant gold smuggling by increasing surveillance at mining sites, Mines Minister Winston Chitando said Monday.】

item.title: 美国食糖产量将创历史新高，糖果制造商喘了口气
item.description: 在去年支付了创纪录的糖价之后，美国的糖商现在可以松一口气了：由于国内产量将创下历史新高，成本正在降低。【原文：After paying record prices for sugar last year, American candymakers can now breathe a sigh of relief: Costs are easing as domestic production is set to climb to an all-time high.】

item.title: 莱恩称欧洲央行货币政策审查将触及工具箱
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，欧洲中央银行的货币政策战略审查将重点关注大流行病后经济会发生什么变化，以及官员们在制定政策时能学到什么。【原文：The European Central Bank’s monetary-policy strategy review will focus on what happens to the economy after the pandemic and what officials can learn for policymaking, according to Chief Economist Philip Lane.】

item.title: 莱恩称欧洲央行应保持渐进式降息策略
item.description: 欧洲央行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，欧洲央行应坚持其谨慎的降息立场；这进一步加强了人们对欧洲央行将于12月而非10月进行下一次降息的预期。【原文：The European Central Bank should stick with its cautious stance on lowering interest rates, Chief Economist Philip Lane said — further strengthening expectations for the next cut to come in December rather than October.】

item.title: 英国石油公司将出售美国陆上风电业务
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）计划出售其在美国的陆上风电业务，以专注于其太阳能部门 Lightsource BP。【原文：BP Plc plans to sell its onshore wind business in the US as it focuses on its solar arm Lightsource BP.】

item.title: 德国商业银行首席执行官称将研究联合信贷银行的战略构想
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）首席执行官曼弗雷德-克诺夫（Manfred Knof）表示，他将研究意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit AG）收购股份后提出的任何建议，并表示希望在这家德国竞争对手的战略中发挥积极作用。【原文：Commerzbank AG Chief Executive Officer Manfred Knof said he’ll study any proposals coming from UniCredit AG after the Italian lender bought a stake and said it wants to play an active role in the German rival’s strategy.】

item.title: 泰坦尼克号船厂业主准备本周进入管理阶段
item.description: 建造泰坦尼克号的船厂的所有者正在进入英国的破产管理程序。【原文：The owner of the shipping yard that built the Titanic is entering administration, a type of insolvency procedure in the UK.】
